title: TPACK-Based Technology Integration Competency Development Intensive Short-Term Course for Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of secondary science curriculum and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Targets corporate science educators to strengthen TPACK (Technological Pedagogical Content Knowledge) model application capabilities in smartphone-based blended learning environments

learning_goals: Technology and content are integrated in science lesson design by leveraging the seven knowledge domains of the TPACK framework.
Develop at least three learning management, assessment, and communication strategies using smartphone-based tools (Canva, Quizlet, etc.).
Create a digital literacy self-assessment checklist and establish a plan for applying technology-integrated instruction.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
